alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 15 at 8:57PM CDT until March 17 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Carthage. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 17.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue falling to below flood stage by early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Pearl River Carthage 17.0 17.4 Tue 7 pm CDT 16.8 16.1 16.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued tomorrow morning by 10 am CDT.
